name: Reality Fragmenter
end_phase_effect_text: Choose a Personnel in play. Remove 2 CC from that Personnel; Move that Personnel to a chosen sector; Add 1 Breach Marker to the Entity in sector Alpha; Flip a chosen sector to Breached
breach_effect_text: Send a Personnel to the Abyss; Send a Personnel to the Abyss; Send a Personnel to the Abyss; Flip a chosen sector to Breached
containment_text: (3+ Personnel in sector Alpha or 3+ Personnel in sector Beta and sector Lambda is not breached)
